briefdescription.para: Prints the content of a list nicely.
Prints the content of a list nicely.
Textra stands for "Tensor Extra". Provides extra functionality to Eigen::Tensor.

detaileddescription.para: This namespace makes shorthand typedef's to Eigen's unsupported Tensor module, and provides handy functions to interface between Eigen::Tensor and Eigen::Matrix objects. The contents of this namespace is co clear it is self-documenting ;)
